★ Release Notes: 2021-08-18 ★
≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡

Thanks for upgrading to the latest version of the ALKS CLI!

* Fixes a bug where passing `--output creds` for a profile not yet in your credentials file causes the profile to be incorrectly set up

Have feedback? https://github.com/Cox-Automotive/ALKS-CLI/issues

☁☁☁☁☁☁  Happy Clouding! ☁☁☁☁☁☁
